description:
Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled spectacle at The Ultimate Skate Showdown!

Witness the city's most fearless skaters as they battle it out in a thrilling contest, unleashing their wildest flips, grinds, and aerial maneuvers. Prepare to be amazed by incredible tricks and fierce competition!

While you cheer on the skaters, refuel with delicious fast food from our dedicated food van, serving up all your favorites to keep your energy high. And to amplify the epic vibes, a live performance by a local rock band will be blasting powerful riffs and infectious beats throughout the event, making it an unforgettable experience.

Don't miss out on this high-octane evening of skate artistry, incredible music, and awesome food!

Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled spectacle at The Ultimate Skate Showdown!

Witness the city's most fearless skaters as they battle it out in a thrilling contest, unleashing their wildest flips, grinds, and aerial maneuvers. Prepare to be amazed by incredible tricks and fierce competition!

While you cheer on the skaters, refuel with delicious fast food from our dedicated food van, serving up all your favorites to keep your energy high. And to amplify the epic vibes, a live performance by a local rock band will be blasting powerful riffs and infectious beats throughout the event, making it an unforgettable experience.

Don't miss out on this high-octane evening of skate artistry, incredible music, and awesome food!

Get ready for a truly unforgettable movie night!

Experience a unique cinematic adventure under the stars at our Summer Drive-In! Enjoy your favorite popular movies on a giant screen from the ultimate comfort of your own car. Snuggle up, bring your snacks, and let the magic of the big screen unfold around you, all while enjoying the fresh night air.

It's the perfect blend of classic nostalgia and modern convenience – a must-do experience for friends, families, and couples!

Get ready for a truly unforgettable movie night!

Experience a unique cinematic adventure under the stars at our Summer Drive-In! Enjoy your favorite popular movies on a giant screen from the ultimate comfort of your own car. Snuggle up, bring your snacks, and let the magic of the big screen unfold around you, all while enjoying the fresh night air.

It's the perfect blend of classic nostalgia and modern convenience – a must-do experience for friends, families, and couples!

Get ready for an exciting evening at "Museum Mash Up," an exclusive exhibition showcasing stunning artworks crafted from copper. This isn't just a static display immerse yourself in the ambiance with live music accompanying the exhibition, creating a unique sensory experience. There's also a possibility of a captivating poetry reading, adding another layer of artistic expression to the event. Join us for a fusion of visual art, melodious sounds, and spoken word, celebrating creativity in an unforgettable setting.

Step back in time and experience the magic of Ohrid with "Ој Љубов, Љубов" (Oh Love, Love), an event that beautifully revives a cherished old tradition!

For generations, the enchanting waters of Lake Ohrid have been the stage for cultural expressions. Years ago, the renowned old Ensemble Biljana used to grace these very waters with their melodies and spirit, creating unforgettable moments for locals and visitors alike.

Now, this beloved tradition is brought back to life by the Cultural Initiative 5 до 12 – Ohrid. Join us for a unique "Old Town sailing/cruise" (Староградска пловидба), where we honor the legacy of Ensemble Biljana and the timeless connection between Ohrid, its lake, and its rich cultural heritage.

Whether from the comfort of your own paddling vessel, or by joining the festivities from the Old Port, come be a part of this living history, celebrating love for Ohrid, its traditions, and its enduring art.

Brass Brothers (Брас Брадерс) are a Macedonian band renowned for their energetic performances and unique genre fusion. They stand out with their brass-heavy sound, characterized by the intensive use of brass wind instruments. This distinct approach gives their music a characteristic "groove" and a positive vibe that sets them apart.

This is an announcement you won't want to miss! On the first day of the Ohrid Wine Festival 2025, the stage will light up with a performance by one of Macedonia's biggest music stars – Tamara Todevska!

Known for her incredible energy, impressive vocal abilities, and hits we all know, Tamara guarantees a top-tier show. Be part of a night when Ohrid will echo to the rhythm of her greatest songs.

Don't miss the chance to experience Tamara Todevska live at the Ohrid Wine Festival 2025! Get ready for an unforgettable start to the festival!

It's a tradition, and it's back! Every night at the Ohrid Wine Festival 2025 will feature awesome DJ support, and on the first day, we're thrilled to have DJ GEC set the mood and get the party started!

He'll be in charge of ensuring a fantastic start to the evening, paving the way for the performances to follow. Get ready for rhythm and positive energy right from the very beginning of the festival!

Keeping with tradition, the Ohrid Wine Festival 2025 wouldn't be complete without its local musicians and artists! We're thrilled to announce that the exceptional rock and roll band, The Backdoor Band, will be taking the stage. Get ready for an electrifying performance that celebrates the vibrant local music scene!

eventName: Ohrid Wine Fest - Pauza za rakija
description:
Prepare for something special! We're incredibly excited to welcome Pauza za Rakija for their debut performance at the Ohrid Wine Festival 2025!

Mark your calendars for Friday, June 27th, and come celebrate this fresh addition to our vibrant festival atmosphere. It's an event you won't want to miss!

eventName: Ohrid Wine Fest - Dj Nasty Deluxe
description: Get ready to start your second festival day right! On Friday, June 27th, DJ Nasty Deluxe will open the festivities at the Ohrid Wine Festival 2025 with a DJ set packed full of positive vibes. Join us to enjoy some great tunes and kick off another fantastic day in Ohrid!

eventName: Ohrid Wine Fest - Dac i Aleksandar
description:
Get ready for an unforgettable night as the legendary duo, Dragan Spasov Dac & Aleksandar Mitevski, bring their incredible blend of entertainment and romantic hits to the Ohrid Wine Festival 2025!

Known for creating the best parties and delivering a truly captivating experience, Dac & Aleksandar promise an evening where "wine and song" truly become a powerful combination. Don't miss this chance to sing along and create lasting memories with one of Macedonia's most beloved duos!
